Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.items

Class SchoolBox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.items.SchoolBox
public class SchoolBox extends Object
class used to initialize, modify and update the school box during the game with the drag and drop of students,addition of towers and professors

  • Constructor Details

    • SchoolBox

      public SchoolBox(String player, javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane container, ModelView modelView, boolean isExpertGame)
      constructor of the representation of the school in the main scene by the AnchorPane, it depends on if the game is expert or not.
      Parameters:
      player - name of the school's player
      container - the AnchorPane that will contain the school
      modelView - the model view of the client
      isExpertGame - boolean that says if the game is for expert or not
